summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching a gated entrance of a building complex. A pedestrian is seen crossing from the left side of the frame towards the right side. There are also vehicles parked on both sides of the entrance.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is approaching the entrance slowly, likely due to the presence of the pedestrian crossing and the gate barrier. The vehicles speed is controlled to ensure safety as it nears the entrance.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A pedestrian, approximately 5 meters away, crossing from left to right, potentially obstructing the vehicles path. 2) Front: A gate barrier, approximately 10 meters away, partially lowered, requiring the vehicle to slow down. 3) Right side: A white car, approximately 15 meters away, parked near the entrance, posing no immediate threat.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a yellow taxi, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city street at night. A white sedan is parked on the right side of the road. A yellow taxi is stationary in the middle of the road, and a motorcyclist is approaching from the left side, potentially crossing the vehicles path.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the yellow taxi and the motorcyclist. The vehicle is likely preparing to decelerate to avoid a collision with the motorcyclist who is moving towards the vehicles path.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 3 meters away, parked and blocking part of the view. 2) Left side: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the vehicles path. 3) Front: A yellow taxi, approximately 10 meters away, stationary in the middle of the road.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. The road is relatively clear with some parked cars on both sides. The vehicle is approaching an intersection with traffic lights visible ahead.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the intersection. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the cars parked on both sides and is preparing to stop at the traffic lights ahead.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection with a green traffic light. A scooter rider is seen on the left side of the frame at 5.0s. By 5.9s, a pedestrian suddenly appears from the left side, crossing in front of the vehicle. By 6.9s, the pedestrian has crossed, and the road ahead is clear.
actions: The self-driving vehicle likely had to decelerate rapidly to avoid a collision with the pedestrian who suddenly appeared from the left side at 5.9s. The vehicles speed would have decreased significantly to ensure safety.
